verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nothing compares to
Life I have in You;
Nothing of this world satisfies.
So I want to let go,
I want to let You know
All that I have to give is Yours.

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Here I am, as gold to the fire
I will surrender to Your hand.
To this place,
Lord, I have come
Ready for Your touch.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
It's all for You.
It's all for You.
I'm letting go.
I'm letting go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
What is it in me
That hangs on for so long?
Why do I fight the tears that come?
I work so hard to
Keep in control when
All that I want is to let go.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I'll take this life
And lay it down;
I'm letting go.
I'm letting go.
My hopes and dreams,
Here at Your feet;
I'm letting go.
I'm letting go.

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
And I am ready for Your life.
And I am ready for You now.
